mapper.insert:

price ,
now_depre ,

cur_money ,
fore_money ,
new_price ,
change_price ,
note ,
) VALUES (

)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, fcord_no, ass_card_no, source_id, price, now_depre, now_manage_depre, add_depre, add_manage_depre, cur_money, fore_money, new_price, change_price, note FROM ass_remould_f_source_inassets WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fcord_no = #{fcord_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and source_id = #{source_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, fcord_no, ass_card_no, source_id, price, now_depre, now_manage_depre, add_depre, add_manage_depre, cur_money, fore_money, new_price, change_price, note FROM ass_remould_f_source_inassets WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fcord_no = #{fcord_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, fcord_no, ass_card_no, source_id, price, now_depre, now_manage_depre, add_depre, add_manage_depre, cur_money, fore_money, new_price, change_price, note FROM ass_remould_f_source_inassets WHERE group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fcord_no = #{fcord_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, fcord_no, ass_card_no, source_id, price, now_depre, now_manage_depre, add_depre, add_manage_depre, cur_money, fore_money, new_price, change_price, note FROM ASS_REMOULD_F_SOURCE_INASSETS where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND fcord_no = #{fcord_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, fcord_no, ass_card_no, source_id, price, now_depre, now_manage_depre, add_depre, add_manage_depre, cur_money, fore_money, new_price, change_price, note FROM ASS_REMOULD_F_SOURCE_INASSETS where group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND fcord_no = #{fcord_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and source_id= #{source_id}

SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.fcord_no, a.ass_card_no, a.source_id, b.source_code||' '||b.source_name as source_name, a.price, a.now_depre, a.now_manage_depre, a.add_depre, a.add_manage_depre, a.cur_money, a.fore_money, new_price, a.change_price, a.note FROM ASS_REMOULD_F_SOURCE_INASSETS a left join HOS_SOURCE b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.source_id = b.source_id where a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.fcord_no = #{fcord_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
